verses.verse: Wherefore <S%G863>leaving<s%> the <S%G3056>doctrine<s%> <S%G746>of<s%> the first <S%G746>principles<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, let us press <S%G5342>on<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G5047>perfection<s%>; <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2598>laying<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> a <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>,

of the <S%G1322>teaching<s%> of <S%G909>baptisms<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> of laying <S%G1936>on<s%> of <S%G5495>hands<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> of <S%G386>resurrection<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2917>of<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> will we <S%G4160>do<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2010>permit<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> as touching those who <S%G5461>were<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G5461>enlightened<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1089>tasted<s%> of <S%G1431>the<s%> <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> <S%G1431>gift<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G3353>partakers<s%> of <S%G4151>the<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>,
and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1089>tasted<s%> <S%G4487>the<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G5037>and<s%> the <S%G1411>powers<s%> of the <S%G165>age<s%> to <S%G3195>come<s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> then fell <S%G3895>away<s%>, it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> to renew <S%G340>them<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%>; seeing they <S%G388>crucify<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G388>afresh<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> put him to an open <S%G3856>shame<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> hath <S%G4095>drunk<s%> the <S%G5205>rain<s%> that <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G4178>oft<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> bringeth <S%G5088>forth<s%> <S%G1008>herbs<s%> <S%G2111>meet<s%> for them1565, 2532 <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> sake it is also <S%G1090>tilled<s%>, <S%G3335>receiveth<s%> <S%G2129>blessing<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>:

but <S%G1161><s%> if it <S%G1627>beareth<s%> <S%G173>thorns<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5146>thistles<s%>, it is <S%G96>rejected<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> nigh <S%G1451>unto<s%> a <S%G2671>curse<s%>; <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5056>end<s%> is <S%G1519>to<s%> be <S%G2740>burned<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%>, <S%G27>beloved<s%>, we are <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> better <S%G2909>things<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> things that <S%G2192>accompany<s%> <S%G1487>salvation<s%>, <S%G2532>though<s%> <S%G2980>we<s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> to <S%G1950>forget<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2873>the<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> ye <S%G1731>showed<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>, in that ye <S%G1247>ministered<s%> unto the <S%G40>saints<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> still do <S%G1247>minister<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> we desire <S%G1937>that<s%> each <S%G1538>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> may <S%G1731>show<s%> <S%G4710>the<s%> <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4710>diligence<s%> <S%G891>unto<s%> the <S%G4136>fulness<s%> of <S%G1680>hope<s%> even <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%>:

that <S%G2443><s%> ye <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3576>sluggish<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3402>imitators<s%> of them <S%G2816>who<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3115>patience<s%> <S%G2816>inherit<s%> the <S%G1860>promises<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1861>when<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> made <S%G1861>promise<s%> to <S%G11>Abraham<s%>, <S%G1893>since<s%> he <S%G2192>could<s%> <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> <S%G3173>greater<s%>, he <S%G3660>sware<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>,
saying <S%G2229><s%>, <S%G3375>Surely<s%> <S%G2127>blessing<s%> I will <S%G2127>bless<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4129>multiplying<s%> I will <S%G4129>multiply<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%>, having patiently <S%G3114>endured<s%>, he <S%G2013>obtained<s%> the <S%G1860>promise<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> men444, Ezekiel3 <S%G3660>swear<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> the <S%G3187>greater<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> in <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G485>dispute<s%> of <S%G846>theirs<s%> the <S%G3727>oath<s%> is <S%G4009>final<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G951>confirmation<s%>.

Wherein3739, 1722 <S%G2316>God<s%>, being <S%G1014>minded<s%> to <S%G1925>show<s%> more <S%G4054>abundantly<s%> unto the <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of the <S%G1860>promise<s%> the <S%G276>immutability<s%> <S%G1012>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1012>counsel<s%>, <S%G3315>interposed<s%> with an <S%G3727>oath<s%>;

that <S%G2443><s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G276>immutable<s%> <S%G4229>things<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G5574>lie<s%>, we may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3874>a<s%> <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G3874>encouragement<s%>, who have fled for <S%G2703>refuge<s%> to lay <S%G2902>hold<s%> of the <S%G1680>hope<s%> set before <S%G4295>us<s%>:

which <S%G3739><s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> an <S%G45>anchor<s%> of the <S%G5590>soul<s%>, a hope <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G804>sure<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G949>stedfast<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1525>entering<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> that which is <S%G2082>within<s%> the <S%G2665>veil<s%>;

whither <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1525>as<s%> a <S%G4274>forerunner<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, having <S%G1096>become<s%> a high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G165>ever<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G5010>order<s%> of <S%G3198>Melchizedek<s%>.
